Second note, I would edit my comment but alas nhentai says no. I mean that it would be possible to make someone immortal, and the ring would do so. I simply forgot how I framed the previous statement. One extra thing, the man with the ring would also gain omnipotence, and time would also have no meaning to him either. And do the clones have their own consciousness or are they simply a disconnected part of the original being's consciousness. Anyway I r8 8/8 gr8 2 masturb8 2

Omnipotence and omniscience are two literary devices often misused. If the genie is all knowing, then she would know every second of every year for every year to ever happen. She would never be surprised by anything, nor forget an items purpose. The genie would experience those 80 years any second they desired, before any of those years happened, and time would have no meaning to them. If the genie was all powerful, then the ability to trap them in a lamp would be impossible. As would be the ability to make someone immortal, like yourself. Something that even if not done out of one's own desire, would definitely be done by a ring that shared powers between the users.
